'''Radiant Spincrystal 28''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Cozy Leisure Time]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next to cargo boxes besides the staircase at the entrance to the base of [[Wangshu Inn]].
